topic.title: Add new virtual currency ( as Bitcoin/Litecoin ) as a reward. Promote the development of ZeroNet.
topic.body:
### Add new virtual currency ( as Bitcoin/Litecoin  ) as a reward mechanism. 



### A virtual currency with a total amount of almost unlimited ipv6 can be generated based on the user, the newly created peer/site, the visited peer/site, the traffic, the connection duration, content rating, and so on. 

#### In order to prevent the rubbish content from stealing in the self-built network, it is also convenient for world-class communication, the rating content should be limited to the text language and evaluated by the machine natural language judgment algorithm.

1604066635_mirrored_txt001_github.body:
To be honest, this is the first time I heard the Brave browser and its Basic Attention Token. After a learning, I feel that it is almost the same as I want to say. However, I hope that the new virtual currency adding by ZeroNet will promote more people to deploy peers and spread ZeroNet.

After all, in some countries, as long as the virtual currency ( as Bitcoin/Litecoin ) , you get a lot of miners. This Industry chain is so hot, even with Ponzi schemes among it. 

I think we can use this effect.
